trans-unit.source: Specifies a print controller that displays a document on a screen as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um controlador de impressão que exibe um documento em uma tela como uma série de imagens.

trans-unit.source: Typically, to use the print preview feature, you create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> class and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, para usar o recurso de visualização de impressão, você cria uma instância de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>classe e defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: The PreviewPrintController is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes, though you can use the PreviewPrintController when managing the display of your own print preview window.
trans-unit.target: O PreviewPrintController é usado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>classes, que você pode usar o PreviewPrintController ao gerenciar a exibição da janela de visualização de impressão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> of the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, performs the print preview, and sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> back to the original value.
trans-unit.target: Quando usado com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>, PreviewPrintController define o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>de associado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A>para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>, realiza a visualização de impressão e define o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>para o valor original.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl.Document%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é exibido durante a visualização de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>a um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método desaloca o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Visão geral do namespace.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Captures the pages of a document as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Captura as páginas de um documento como uma série de imagens.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> image representation contained in a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> to implement your own print preview form.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>imagem representação contida em um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo>para implementar seu próprio formulário de visualização de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"></xref> that contains the pages of a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> as a series of images.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz do tipo <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPageInfo"> </xref> que contém as páginas de um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> como uma série de imagens.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this controller is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esse controlador é usado para visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Conclui a sequência de controle que determina quando e como visualizar uma página em um documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, this method is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se uma exceção é gerada dentro de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>eventos de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, este método não é chamado.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é exibido durante a visualização de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>a um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O método OnEndPage limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método desaloca o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento sendo visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre como visualizar uma página no documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Conclui a sequência de controle que determina quando e como visualizar um documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: This method is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é chamado imediatamente após <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Even if an uncaught exception was thrown during the print preview process, OnEndPrint is called.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo se uma exceção não tratada foi lançada durante o processo de visualização de impressão, OnEndPrint é chamado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é exibido durante a visualização de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>a um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o método OnEndPrint desaloca o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento sendo visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview the print document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre como visualizar o documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a page in a print document.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a sequência de controle que determina quando e como visualizar uma página em um documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage é chamado imediatamente antes <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é exibido durante a visualização de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>é chamado, os conjuntos de método OnStartPage de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>a um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método desaloca o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, makes the print preview look better.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Suavização, também conhecida como escala de cinza, melhoram a visualização de impressão a aparência.

trans-unit.source: However, the use of anti-aliasing can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o uso de suavização pode reduzir a velocidade de processamento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about anti-aliasing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a suavização, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.UseAntiAlias%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento sendo visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to preview a page in the print document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre como visualizar uma página no documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of this parameter will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs.Graphics%2A?displayProperty=fullName> propriedade desse parâmetro será <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value returned from this method will be used to set this property.
trans-unit.target: O valor retornado desse método será ser usado para definir essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que representa uma página de um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to preview a print document.
trans-unit.target: Inicia a sequência de controle que determina quando e como visualizar um documento de impressão.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint é chamado imediatamente após <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is displayed during the print preview.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é exibido durante a visualização de impressão.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois OnStartPrint é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>a um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método desaloca o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint verifies that the printer settings are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint verifica se as configurações da impressora são válidas.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document being previewed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento sendo visualizado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains data about how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém dados sobre como imprimir o documento.

trans-unit.source: The printer named in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property does not exist.
trans-unit.target: A impressora nomeada no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> a propriedade não existe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use anti-aliasing when displaying the print preview.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve usar a suavização ao exibir a visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: Anti-aliasing, also known as gray scaling, uses several shades of gray around areas of curves and diagonals in text to give the text a smoother appearance.
trans-unit.target: Suavização, também conhecido como cinza dimensionamento, usa vários tons de cinza ao redor de áreas de curvas e diagonais em texto para que o texto de uma aparência mais suave.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > While using anti-aliasing makes the print preview look better, it can slow down the rendering speed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Enquanto usando a suavização melhoram a visualização de impressão a aparência, isso pode reduzir a velocidade de processamento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the print preview uses anti-aliasing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a visualização de impressão usa a suavização; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
